articles.author: Rachel Pannett
articles.title: Ancient Europeans were lactose intolerant. They drank milk anyway, study finds. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Despite digestive problems, ancient Europeans drank milk for millennia, the study found, casting doubt on theories on how humans evolved to tolerate it.
articles.content:

articles.author: CNN
articles.title: NASA reveals when first ever Mars samples will return to Earth - 9News
articles.description: The first mission to return samples from another planet will touch down on Earth in 2033, according to NASA and European Space Agency officials.

articles.title: Wiegman: 'This result will go all over Europe and the world' - The42
articles.description: England reached the Euro 2022 final with a 4-0 victory over the world’s second highest ranked side.
articles.content:
